system.description: You can combine elemental air and water for profound effect both on land and at sea. You can use this trait to cast fog cloud. Starting at 3rd level, you can use this trait to cast gust of wind. Starting at 5th level, you can use this trait to cast wall of water. You can only cast each spell with this feature once between long rests. The spellcasting ability for these spells is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma
